thread.title: Chinese soccer player gets knocked out by teammate
thread.title_full: Chinese soccer player gets knocked out by teammate - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Chinese soccer player gets knocked out by teammate
text:
A Chinese soccer player is recovering after a teammate kicked him in the face during a game on Saturday.
Xiong Fei, who plays for Shenhua Football Club, was trying to header the ball away from his team’s side of the field during a game against Changchun Yatai when Li Jianbin went for the ball with a bicycle kick.
But Jianbin’s foot hit Fei in the chin — knocking him out in mid-air.
wang jinsong via Facebook Shanghai Shenhua FC's Li Jianbin accidentally bicylce kicks his teammate Xiong Fei. wang jinsong via Facebook Xiong Fei was treated on the field and is now recovering. Previous Next Enlarge Fei received treatment on the field for the kick before he was taken away on a stretcher.
He seemed to be in good spirits when his team tweeted a picture of Fei wearing a bandage on his chin.
